src:
Kesan Pertama Pelatih Hong Kong di Indonesia: Cuacanya Sangat Panas
05 Nov 2019, 17:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timnas Hong Kong U-19 bersiap mengarungi Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 di Indonesia. Pada partai pertama Grup K, Hong Kong akan menghadapi Korea Utara di Stadion Madya, Senayan, Jakarta, Kamis (6/11/2019).
Hong Kong telah tiba di Jakarta sejak beberapa hari lalu. Sang pelatih, Amason Tholakur Mararnason mengatakan timnya merasakan cuaca yang sangat panas di Indonesia.
"Kami sudah lima hari berada di Jakarta. Indonesia sangat panas. Terutama di pagi hari. Meski begitu, kami sangat senang dan siap," ujar Amason saat sesi konferensi pers di Hotel Atlet Century, Senayan, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11).
Amason menolak mengomentari kekuatan Timnas Indonesia U-19. Hong Kong disebutnya masih fokus melawan Korea Utara.
"Kami bermain melawan Korea Utara dulu. Untuk Indonesia, kami belum siap berkomentar," katanya.

Baca halaman berikutnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
First impressions of Hong Kong trainers in Indonesia: The weather is very hot
05 Nov 2019, 17:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Hong Kong U-19 national team preparing to sail the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup in Indonesia. In the first party of Group K, Hong Kong will face North Korea at the Madya Stadium, Senayan, Jakarta, Thursday (11/06/2019).
Hong Kong has arrived in Jakarta since a few days ago. The coach, Amason Tholakur Mararnason said his team felt very hot weather in Indonesia.
"We have been in Jakarta for five days. Indonesia is very hot. Especially in the morning. Even so, we are very happy and ready," Amason said during a press conference session at the Century Athlete Hotel, Senayan, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/5).
Amason declined to comment on the strength of the Indonesian National Team U-19. He said Hong Kong was still focused on fighting North Korea.
"We played against North Korea first. For Indonesia, we are not ready to comment," he said.
